recipesJson.name: Strawberry Wafer
recipesJson.author: RinVapes
recipesJson.description: To me this tastes exactly like those cheap strawberry wafer cookies. The OoO vanilla wafer is essential as it really does taste like the vanilla version of the wafers. (if you prefer vanilla, don't add the strawberry) This is a shake and vape.

reviews.text: This is very tasty and pretty accurate. I really like the balance of the strawberry and wafer. I let it steep for about a month or so and the stb is still present without being in your face, and I like that as its more like the real thing.
